H0.text: Which drug, used as a stimulant in heart failure, can cause convulsions and paralysis if overdosed. Digoxin

H1.text: Which drug, used as a stimulant in heart failure, can cause convulsions and paralysis if overdosed. Theophylline

H2.text: Which drug, used as a stimulant in heart failure, can cause convulsions and paralysis if overdosed. Caffeine

H3.text: Which drug, used as a stimulant in heart failure, can cause convulsions and paralysis if overdosed. Stricnine

A4.text: Seizures can also occur in severe cases of toxicity, and are considered to be a neurological emergency.
